setting.name: DNSPriServerIP
setting.label: DNS Server
setting.description: IP Address of the primary DNS server

setting.name: DNSSecServerIP
setting.label: Secondary DNS Server
setting.description: IP Address of the secondary DNS server

setting.name: EnableSyslog
setting.label: Use Syslog
setting.description: If checked syslog server is used.

setting.name: SyslogServerIP
setting.label: Syslog Server
setting.description: IP Address of the syslog server

setting.name: ISPROXYUSED
setting.label: Use Proxy
setting.description: If unchecked proxy isnâ€™t used, the internal routing table is used instead. If checked gateway will use SIP proxy and SIP Proxy Address has to be set.

setting.name: PROXYNAME
setting.label: SIP Proxy Domain Name
setting.description: Defines the Home Proxy Domain Name.If specified, the Proxy Name is used as Request-URI in REGISTER, INVITE and other SIP messages. If not specified, the Proxy IP address is used instead.

setting.name: PROXYIP
setting.label: SIP Proxy Address
setting.description: IP address and optionally port number of the primary Proxy server you are using. Enter the IP address as FQDN or in dotted format notation for example 201.10.8.1. You can also specify the selected port in the format: IP Address:port

setting.name: SIPDESTINATIONPORT
setting.label: SIP Proxy Port
setting.description: Domain name used by the gateway name.

setting.name: ISREGISTERNEEDED
setting.label: Registration Needed
setting.description: If checked gateway will register with SIP proxy. Usually registration is not required for FXO gateways.

setting.name: SIPGATEWAYNAME
setting.label: Gateway Domain Name
setting.description: Domain name used by the gateway name.

setting.name: TARGETOFCHANNEL0
setting.label: Automatic dialing port 0
setting.description: Automactic dialing for this port. Enter destination phone number followed by comma and 1 if automatic should be enabled, or zero if it should be disabled.

setting.name: MAXDIGITS
setting.label: Maximum Digits
setting.description: Maximum number of digits that can be dialed. The valid range is 1 to 49.
